name: Turbo Microwave-inator 2000 Manager
description:
Made by Team Potetgutane

Made during a game jam, theme was micro manager.

Once upon a time there was a scientist, hellbent on Revolutionizing the world of microwaving at all costs.

And one day after a long day of sciencing he invented the beautiful, the magnificent

Turbo Microwave-inator 2000 (name Subject To Change)

Controls:

Best played in fullscreen

Left and right arrow keys to control valve

Spacebar to control crank/lever 

Credits:

VFX and intro: https://fusionstyle.itch.io/

3D modeling and voice acting: https://erlendsol.itch.io/

3D modeling and cover image: https://itch.io/profile/villman
